member.name: T:CUITe.Controls.HtmlControls.CUITe_HtmlControl`1
member.summary: Base class for all CUITe_Html controls, inherits from CUITe_ControlBase
member.typeparam: The Coded UI Test Html control type

member.name: M:CUITe.Controls.CUITe_ControlBase`1.UnWrap
member.summary: UnWraps the CUITe_Html* or CUITe_Sl* controls to expose the underlying UITestControl. This helps when you want to use any methods/properties of the underlying UITestControl. CUITe_Html* or CUITe_Sl* controls are wrappers/abstractions which hides complexity. UnWrap() helps you break the abstraction.
member.returns: The underlying UITestControl instance. For example, returns HtmlEdit in case of CUITe_HtmlEdit.

member.name: M:CUITe.Controls.HtmlControls.CUITe_HtmlControl`1.GetChildren
member.summary: Returns a list of all first level children of the current CUITe control.
member.returns: list of all first level children
